ERC20: 初始代币所有者是constructor中的调用_mint的msg.sender

一开始所有代币在0地址，通过_mint调用将代币transfer到msg.sender

constructor(uint256 initialSupply) ERC20("MyToken", "MTK") {
    _mint(msg.sender, initialSupply);
}

function _mint(address account, uint256 value) internal {
    if (account == address(0)) {
        revert ERC20InvalidReceiver(address(0));
    }
    _update(address(0), account, value);
}

docs.text:
vrfCoordinatorInterfaceV2.requestRandomWords->chainLink nodes->(call)fufillRandomwords

RequestRandomWords

The chainlink nodes listen the event edited by requestRandomWords function call

function performUpkeep(bytes calldata ) external override {
   (bool upkeepNeeded,) = checkUpkeep(bytes(""));
   if(!upkeepNeeded){
        revert Raffle__NotPerformUpkeep(address(this).balance, s_players.length, uint256(s_raffleState));
   }
    // Request the RNG
    // https://docs.chain.link/vrf/v2/subscription/supported-networks
    s_raffleState = RaffleState.CALCULATING;

    uint256 requestId = i_vrfCoordinator.requestRandomWords(
        i_gasLane, // gas lane
        i_subscriptionId,
        REQUEST_CONFIRMATIONS,
        i_callbackGasLimit,
        NUM_WORDS
    );
    emit RequestedRaffleWinner(requestId);
}

fufillRandomwords(called by chainlink nodes)

ChainlinkVRF

override the function provided in VrfCoordinatorV2Interface

function fulfillRandomWords(
    uint256 ,
    uint256[] memory randomWord
) internal override {
    uint256 winnerIndex = randomWord[0] % s_players.length;
    s_recentWinner = s_players[winnerIndex];
    s_raffleState = RaffleState.OPEN;
    s_lastTimeStamp = block.timestamp;
    s_players = new address payable[](0);
    emit PickedWinner(s_recentWinner);

    (bool success, ) = s_recentWinner.call{value: address(this).balance}("");
    if(!success) {
        revert Raffle__TranferFailed();
    }
}

docs.text:
Override checkUpkeep to set the condition.

function checkUpkeep(
    bytes memory 
)
    public
    view
    override
    returns (bool upkeepNeeded, bytes memory /* performData */)
{
    bool timeSatisfied = (block.timestamp - s_lastTimeStamp) > i_interval;
    bool raffleOpen = s_raffleState == RaffleState.OPEN;
    bool hasPlayers = s_players.length > 0;
    bool hasBalance = address(this).balance > 0;
    bool doUpkeep = timeSatisfied && raffleOpen && hasPlayers && hasBalance;
    return (doUpkeep, "");
}

Override performUpkeep to set the performing function called by chainlink nodes.
